subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Wesley Sneijder scored a late goal Wednesday to help Galatasaray advance to the first knockout stage of the Champions League with a 1-0 win over Juventus in a weather-delayed match in Istanbul.
snippet: Wesley Sneijder scored a late goal Wednesday to help Galatasaray advance to the first knockout stage of the Champions League with a 1-0 win over Juventus in a weather-delayed match in Istanbul.
